site_url.description: The URL of the website for which the search analytics data is being reported.

search_type.description: The type of search (e.g., web, image, video) that led users to the website.

date.description: The date when the search data was recorded.

country.description: The country from which the search originated.

page.description: The specific page URL within the website that appeared in search results.

device.description: The type of device used by the user for the search query (e.g., desktop, mobile).

clicks.description: The total number of times users clicked on search results that led to the linked website.

impressions.description: The total number of times a search result from the linked website was shown to users.

ctr.description: Click-through rate: The percentage of clicks out of the total impressions for a given search query.

position.description: The average position at which the website's search results appeared to users.
